column3: OMV expands output with North Sea deal OSLO/VIENNA
column4: Aug 19 Norway's Statoil  sold stakes in North Sea oil fields to Austria's OMV  on Monday
column5: in a $2.65 billion deal giving the former cash to develop new projects and placing the latter on course to meet ambitious output targets.

column2: Alibaba in talks with HKEx on ownership structure ahead of IPO-sources HONG KONG
column3: Aug 19 Alibaba Group Holding Ltd  is in talks with the Hong Kong stock exchange about allowing its founders to maintain control over the Chinese e-commerce company even after it becomes listed
column4: people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
